nodes.text: The Tantsor system was a star system that a small group of smugglers operated in during the time of the New Republic. In about 8 ABY, rumors of the smugglers' activity reached representatives of the Empire of the Hand, who suspected that forces of the alien warlord Nuso Esva might be operating in the system. However, after some investigation, the Imperials came to the conclusion that the activity in the system was unrelated to Esva.
